items.summary: Add the newly uploaded logo (download-1.webp) as a static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and create a crisp, centered, square logo file suitable for web use.

Update the sticky header brand area (frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/HeaderNav.tsx) to display the new logo image alongside the existing brand text ("King Kingdom" and "Complete Construction Solutions"), ensuring the logo is not stretched or cropped and remains well-aligned and responsive on small screens.
